string.text: People, the militaries have resumed the patrol under the broken bridge at the outpost. Their sniper has also settled there… I didn’t manage to find out where \nexactly, because I had to scarper from there…
I’ve heard from the patrol talks, that the militaries gather all they’ve found at the 2nd floor of the Institute’s building. If there are willing to risk for the gain - try to \nget through.
Show caution everyone. Militaries have established here for a long time. Their base is in institute building. I’ve seen several tens of people and sniper on the \nroof.
Messrs stalkers… Need “Night star” promptly… I pay fair bread… It is said that there is one remaining on the outpost since the last emission…
Copy everyone… Bandits have settled at the factory again. Taking off bribes off the stalkers… Someone near there, intimidate those freaks… I won’t be in \ndebt.
Attention everyone… Cronies, don’t pry into the block post… Some jerks have attacked the patrol… All in all it’s really hot there… They’ll send dragoons for \nsure.

Recently courier Barman with the goods has been taken on the army post… All in all tasty morsel is the box with the artifacts, lies somewhere at \ncommander’s… So, if the life bothers someone - one can risk.
To the east form the bridge saw the pack of dogs on the outpost - about 20-30 bayonets:)… So, make your conclusions, gentlemen…
Attention everyone. To the north from the bridge on the outpost, in about 100 meters over the forsaken APC stumbled on the gathering of “Electras”… Who \nfinds this info useful owes me a beer.
I’m at the Dump, the place is crowded with blind dogs… It seems that new troops came from the center, be cautious everyone.
It seems that I’ve just seen several soldiers from Duty. I wonder, whom did they come for?

Don’t butt into the Dark Valley, zombies are streaming from there, crowds of them… Don’t waste the bullets, damn. It’s been a long time since we had to clear \nthe valley. What a hell is Duty looking at?
Somebody has shot Fedya Black at the garage… I sense those bandits are here again.
Three men have settled in the garage… Be cautious, it seems that these convicts came again with the old.
Gunslinger returned! I’ve just heard from the ables… Returned from the very center! It seems that we’ll make a damn good breach to the center soon, there \nwe’ll see who is who…
…I’m feeling badly, mates, it got me. If someone is near the rusty lake now, give a hand, I won’t stay in debt… All in all I’ll try to get out of here myself, then \nwe’ll see.
…Vasya says that there is one more braded one appeared, just left Trader. You know what to do…
